nodes.text: Bradel was a Human male Commander who served the Galactic Republic during the Cold War and the Alderaan Civil War. In 3643 BBY, Bradel was in contact Katei Elinari Panteer, who was one the surviving Panteers. During this time, he and Katei tasked a Republic agent to eliminate Bouris Ulgo, though Bradel urged for the usurper to be apprehended for a trial.
Bradel is a non-player character from the massively multi-player online role playing game Star Wars: The Old Republic released by BioWare in 2011. He is voiced by Norm Woodel.
